Package camzup.core

Class Utils.PeriodicEasing

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Utils.PeriodicEasing
All Implemented Interfaces:
Utils.EasingFuncPrm<Float>, Utils.TriFunction<Float,Float,Float,Float>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Utils.LerpCCW, Utils.LerpCW, Utils.LerpNear
Enclosing class:
Utils
public abstract static class Utils.PeriodicEasing extends Object implements Utils.EasingFuncPrm<Float>
An abstract class to cover the easing periodic of values, such as angles and hues in HSV color space. Allows the range to be set to, for example, TAU radians, 360.0 degrees or 1.0 color channel.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public Float apply(Float origin, Float dest, Float step)
      Applies the easing function. The abstract class's implementation check to see if the step is out of bounds, [0.0, 1.0] and if mod(origin, range) is equal to mod(dest, range). The origin is returned when the step is less than 0.0; the destination, when the step is greater than 1.0.
      Specified by:
      apply in interface Utils.EasingFuncPrm<Float>
      Specified by:
      apply in interface Utils.TriFunction<Float,Float,Float,Float>
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin
      dest - the destination
      step - the step
      Returns:
      the eased object
      See Also:
      • eval(float, float)

      public void setRange(float range)
